text: , also known as Centrair, is an Japanese airport on an artificial island in Ise Bay in Aichi Prefecture.Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, and Transport (MLIT), CHUBU CENTRAIR International Airport. Retrieved 2012-1-20. It is an international airport for the region. The airport is south of Nagoya in central Japan. == Related pages == * List of airports in Japan ==References== == Other websites == * * Central Japan International Airport ; * Japan Mint, The Opening of CHUBU CENTRAIR International Airport 500 Yen Commemorative Silver Proof Coin Category:Airports in Japan Category:Aichi Prefecture
